name: Fingering My Deity [Tomokazu R18]
description:
Fangame for TomoxKazuha  pairing from Genshin Impact. Can be installed immediately on mobile/tab for Android. For IOS users, please refer to the guide below.

- A kinetic novel 

- Pairing is Tomox Kazuha from Genshin Impact R18. 

- Historical / religion AU.

- CW : Modern Alternate Universe, feminization, crossdressing,  objectification, sexual assault, dead doves, dubious consent, Tomo projecting his mother issues to Kazuha, very questionable consent. Keep in mind that this is written as Eroge.

- Beware of how self-indulgent the story is. 

>>>>>>>>IOS GUIDE

 - install KochoVN app! 

- download the .kocho file 

 - just plug the file in that app, you can play immediately with ease^^

Twitter @ emilebois.
